headline: Erie Indemnity : Insurance promotes Cody Cook and Sarah Shine to executive vice President roles
summary: ERIE, Pa., Dec. 18, 2024 - Erie Insurance today announced that Cody Cook and Sarah Shine have been promoted to executive vice presidents, effective Jan. 1, 2025. Both leaders are currently serving as...
